column5: anyone planning on fishing this tourney this year...has anyone on here fished it in the past? ??

I fished it 2 years ago ,planning on fishing it this year,good tournament , I herd for next year the entry fee is gonna be $2000 but first prize is $250,000.its also a team tournament,2 people in the boat, up here they run a 4 fish per day and you can only weigh in 2 fish at a time so theres a little more stratagy involved on how far to run in the after noon or after your first weigh in
